title: Yoga & meditation with Liz
cleaned_text: Ongoing classes Chair yoga online | Mondays 3:30-4:30pm CT This class is appropriate for those who are wheelchair bound, are recovering from an injury/health event, have balance issues, or just need a safe place to start a low-impact movement practice. No experience or equipment needed, just a chair! [REGISTER HERE](https://hw-acupuncture.square.site/product/yoga-and-meditation-classes-w-liz/27?cp=true&sa=true&sbp=false&q=false). Exploring Meditation online | Sundays 4-4:45pm CT Based on classic meditation teachings adapted to suit modern life, the iRest meditation technique helps you meet each movement with peace and well-being. Practiced and taught by thousands of people in a wide range of settings, iRest is simple to grasp and, once learned, becomes a set of tools for life. Benefits include improved sleep; relief of chronic pain; decreased stress, depression and anxiety; deeper yoga practice; and better health and well-being. No yoga or meditation experience needed to join this online class! Read
